c5ecf41c-a571-458e-b941-cc49f997ea99.name: Frequency: Constantly

e5bd0e09-06a8-4ae1-b025-51d0c06da0d1.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

6fab76a8-ccc6-4b7d-8a41-50956910f0b0.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

1c06ae04-3705-4c02-a430-4a7a671d9f16.name: Frequency: Monthly
1c06ae04-3705-4c02-a430-4a7a671d9f16.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

8e1adf4c-9259-41bd-9101-14ceb0cfeebf.name: Frequency: Seasonally
8e1adf4c-9259-41bd-9101-14ceb0cfeebf.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

441cc0cf-fab5-4cb2-9924-9e894e9b1259.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

90b556bb-889c-442c-82cf-32f207ac5b8f.name: Aging
90b556bb-889c-442c-82cf-32f207ac5b8f.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency
